item.title: Report I-2024100119
item.description:
Report I-2024100119

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T09:15:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-27
  • City: Richland
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Shipment arrived in JCK at 12:08 AM. Shipment was crushed down and was emitting an odor Bottom packages had collapsed. Hazmat One was called to clean up at 12:14 AM, the cleanup crew arrived at 3:00 AM and were finished at 4:00 AM. l-55 GAL drum of debris was collected and taken with Hazmat One.

item.title: Report I-2024100120
item.description:
Report I-2024100120

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T09:15:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-16
  • City: Richland
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: SOUTHEASTERN FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Call came in at 12:47 AM Shipment had arrived at JCK and was damaged due to pallet collapsing under its on weight. Hazmat One was called at 12:59 AM. The Dock associates were ask to wait off the dock until the clean up crew were done due to the fumes(4 hours). The Hazmat crew arrived at 3:00 AM, they discovered 33 1-Gal jugs were leaking. They were finished at 5:30 AM 2-55 GAL drums of damaged jugs and 2- overpacks full of good jugs were left on-site until disposal can be authorized.
